memberdef.name: S3_LOGPROB_ZERO_F

briefdescription.para: Size definitions for more semantially meaningful units.

detaileddescription.para: Illegal value definitions, limits, and tests for specific types. NOTE: Types will be either int32 or smaller; only smaller ones may be unsigned (i.e., no type will be uint32).
Common for both s3 and s3.X decoder.
